reviews.snippet:
I have known this Shinjuku-tei for their Wagyu ramen. This time I’ve tried cold Wagyu noodles and voila!! That’s so good.

It’s complexed taste that’s only possible with many differeingredients matching together.
I’m amazingly satisfied💗
